item.title: Home 19
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="niche_06_slide_eshaver" slidertitle="Home 19 Eshaver"][/rev_slider]

The World’s most efficient shaver.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

View Features

Turbo-powered

10% extra power boost to get through the dense parts of beards faster.

MultiPrecision blade system

Get a shave that’s fast and close, raising and cutting hairs and remaining stubble in just a few strokes.

Personal comfort settings

Choose between 3 modes to customize your shave: Sensitive, normal or fast – for a quick shave that saves you time.

Turbo-powered

10% extra power boost to get through the dense parts of beards faster.

MultiPrecision blade system

Get a shave that’s fast and close, raising and cutting hairs and remaining stubble in just a few strokes.

Personal comfort settings

Choose between 3 modes to customize your shave: Sensitive, normal or fast – for a quick shave that saves you time.

Closeness & skin comfort

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Wet or dry shaving experience

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Fascinating design

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. more features

Get a perfect shave

Easy to rinse clean

Incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam

Easy maintenance

Incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam

Replace with 1 click

Incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam

[rev_slider alias="niche_06_dimensions" slidertitle="Home 19 dimensions"][/rev_slider]testimonials

User Reviews

Chrissy From Fresno, Ca Really great shaver!!! "My son loves it. It seems like it's more fun for him. Maybe because of the smoother ride. It's also way more comfortable for my husband and I. Nomore picking up the stroller for uneven sidewalk. It may not be the most expensive jogging stroller" Sarach From Fresno, Ca Close,comfortab shave "I wanted a stroller for me and my baby that was easy to take around and workout with. I would recommend buying a stroller like this for multiple uses. My older kids are able to help me because it has a wrist strap so it won't get away" Rudol From Fresno, Ca Great quality for the price. "Maybe it's just me, but it doesn't cut as deep as I wanted it to. Don't be afraid of pressing into your skin. I recommend using it for general body hair where it's time-consuming to use a normal razor. For the face, I recommend a regular razor "

What’s in the box?

  • eShaver
  • 3 sets colour panels
  • Glass Carafe
  • Instruction manual

Are you ready to buy

Shop Now Or Call us at+844 - 1800 333 558
